description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 408,808 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 1.2 million Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
